00019 #ifndef __UTIL_PATH_H__
00020 #define __UTIL_PATH_H__
00021 
00022 /* Utility functions to get paths to files distributed with the program. For
00023  * the standalone apps, paths are relative to the executable, for dynamically
00024  * linked libraries, the path to the library may be set with path_init, which
00025  * then makes all paths relative to that. */
00026 
00027 #include "util_string.h"
00028 #include "util_types.h"
00029 #include "util_vector.h"
00030 
00031 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00032 
00033 void path_init(const string& path = "", const string& user_path = "");
00034 string path_get(const string& sub = "");
00035 string path_user_get(const string& sub = "");
00036 
00037 string path_filename(const string& path);
00038 string path_dirname(const string& path);
00039 string path_join(const string& dir, const string& file);
00040 
00041 string path_escape(const string& path);
00042 bool path_exists(const string& path);
00043 string path_files_md5_hash(const string& dir);
00044 
00045 void path_create_directories(const string& path);
00046 bool path_write_binary(const string& path, const vector<uint8_t>& binary);
00047 bool path_read_binary(const string& path, vector<uint8_t>& binary);
00048 
00049 string path_source_replace_includes(const string& source, const string& path);
00050 
00051 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
00052 
00053 #endif
